name: Athlete Shave Salon Games
description:
Can you help our your friends get ready for the big Sports game?

Play the best Hair Shave Salon game in the app store today!! Tons of salon games wrapped up into a single game!!

Exciting Game Modes:
- Hair Shave Salon
- Hair Styling & Make-Up
- Dress-Up & Make-Up, and much more!!

Have fun playing this fun kids game!
